name: TETRA (LeithBA)
description:
TETRA

Puzzle game inspired by Tetris where the player is invited to rearrange the beloved tetra shapes to form a perfect color gradient.

Level EASY and MEDIUM are doable in a matter a minutes.

Level HARD is hard. Don't feel bad if you cannot finish it. You are not meant to.

Thanks for playing!

LeithBA.com

zohra-mradz.com

Notes

The drag and drop feature might not work properly on certain browsers. If you encounter problems, try to play in full screen. ;)
